item.description:
No, it's not going to be about basketball, just us getting together once again to workshop each others' writing! Although, it could be about basketball...

Kate R has uploaded her story in the Files section soon, so please read and come prepared to discuss!

Also please plan to purchase something from the cafe, however small it may be. It's only fair since we're using their space.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the bigger room with more seating, drinking Peanut Butter Chocolate Smoothies. Well, some of us will be.
item.name: March Madness Workshop
